post_message: Special debate coverage: Amy Goodman and Nermeen Shaikh host a pre-debate roundtable from 8-9PM ET with Kimberlé Williams Crenshaw, Melina Abdullah of Black Lives Matter - Los Angeles, Gyasi Ross, Soraya Chemaly, The Intercept's Lee Fang and Rashid Khalidi, followed by an expanded debate giving third party candidates a chance to respond to town hall questions.
